public class RimGraphXMLSpeaker.ContentBuilder
extends XMLSpeaker.ContentBuilder

The ContentBuilder with more HL7 specific convenience methods added.

Method Detail

nullValueHandled

public boolean nullValueHandled(ANY value)
                         throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
Check if the value is a null value and if so, put the nullFlavor attribute on the attributes list. Also creates the xsi:type attribute.

Parameters:
value - the value checked
Returns:
true if value was null and attribute added otherwise false
Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException

nullValueHandled

public boolean nullValueHandled(ANY value,
                                java.lang.String localName)
                         throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
Check if the value is a null value and if so, put the nullFlavor attribute on the attributes list and emit an otherwise empty element.

Parameters:
value - the value checked
localName - the localName of the XML element
Returns:
true if value was null and attribute added otherwise false
Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException

addAttribute

public void addAttribute(java.lang.String localName,
                         ANY value)
If the value is not null and has no null flavor, add it as an attribute with given local name and no namespace.
